detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Iron-on letter patches to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 2.5x3.5 cm.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a concealed zip. Decorative covered buttons and a high split at one side. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar and a concealed zip at the back. Draped front and a gathered seam at the back of the skirt. Long sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders for added volume. Jersey lining.
Shirt woven in a linen and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, long sleeves and a narrow, detachable belt at the waist. Lined.
Padded, ankle boot slippers in soft pile with padded appliqués and embroidery on the feet. Pile linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with broderie anglaise. V-neck, covered buttons down the front and short, voluminous, elasticated puff sleeves.
Long, sleeveless dress in a heavily draping, hole-knit cotton blend with a flare to the hem and ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Unlined.

Jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with a detachable hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, chest pockets with a button and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.

Fully lined, underwired tankini top with moulded, lightly padded cups with  flounces at the top. Wide, detachable multiway shoulder straps, gathered seams at the sides and a silicone trim to hold the top in place.
Hat in a rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top and a turned-up hem.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Non-padded bra in mesh with underwired, unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a small embroidery detail on the front and an opening with ties at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in patterned viscose jersey with narrow tie shoulder straps and narrow ties below the shoulders. Unlined.
Joggers in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and ribbed hems.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a text motif in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and back pockets with decorative seams. Legs with decorative stitching and slim hems.
Top in soft, textured sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless, calf-length, V-neck dress in a crinkled weave with a concealed zip in one side. Flounce around the neckline that continues along the shoulder straps, a gathered seam under the bust and a diagonal seam across the lower section of the skirt. Lined over the bust.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Trousers in a jacquard weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and straight legs with creases.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a detachable belt with a round metal buckle at the waist and no fasteners. Adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Hi-tops in mesh with imitation leather details, an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Pyjamas in cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif at the top and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with a drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit cotton and silk blend with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Calf-length, flared skirt in airy cotton and modal seersucker. Side pockets and a high paper bag waist with pleats, elastication and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jumper in a fine, striped knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Turtleneck top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.
Leggings in a sturdy viscose blend. Regular waist with covered elastication.
Long-sleeved jumper in a loose-knit linen blend with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.

Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to long shorts. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and legs that can be folded up and fastened with a tab and button.
Narrow belt in leather with a metal buckle. The belt is extra-long at one end. Width approx. 3 cm.
Sun hat in woven fabric with a decorative bow. Cotton lining. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Shorter top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a frill trim at the top and wide shoulder straps. Lacing at the front and a frill trim at the hem. Lined.

LIMITED EDITION. Dress in an airy weave with a glittery thread pattern. Frill-trimmed stand-up collar, an opening with ties at the top and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at one side. Lined.
Ankle-length kaftan in woven fabric with a V-neck, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Shimmering sequined border around the neckline, sleeves and hem, and down the front.
Vest top in cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with spaghetti shoulder straps and gathered tiers.
Sun hat in cotton canvas with ties under the chin. Cotton lining. Width of brim 4 cm.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a regular waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft jersey.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Short dress in a textured-weave cotton blend with a boat neck. Double-layered top with gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Smocked section for a fitted style over the bust, waist and hips relaxing into a voluminous flounced skirt.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back that has a rubber print and ventilating hole pattern.

Jacket in a nylon blend with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and ventilation holes under the arms. Zipped side pockets, a tab and hook and loop fastening at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist with concealed elastication, concealed zip in one side and tapered legs with creases.
Top in soft cotton jersey with inset lace trims at the front and butterfly sleeves in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.

Short coat in soft faux shearling with large notch lapels with a buttonhole, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and wide, straight sleeves. Recycled polyester lining.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Soft jersey tops with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Knee-length skirt in an airy weave with a wrapover front and a high waist with ties at one side. Unlined.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in a pima cotton weave with a collar and detachable storm flap at the front. Dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs. Seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist, large patch front pockets and a high single back vent. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short puff sleeves. Seam under the bust and at the waist with elastication at the back, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Tailored trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a concealed zip in the side and fake back pocket. Straight tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Ankle-length twill trousers with a regular waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Ankle boots in patent leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and two buttons at the top.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Regular waist with concealed elastication. Unlined.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
